moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以连击取消

moves.notesEN: * 3 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空时+3f收招

moves.notesEN: Forces the opponent into a standing position
moves.notesCN: 强制对手站立

moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter on a mid-air opponent Forces the opponent into a standing position
moves.notesCN: 当打中空中对手且打出康或确反康时强制对手进入浮空硬直。强制对手站立

moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以被连击取消

moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以被连击取消

moves.notesEN: *2 frames of recovery added when the attack is blocked or misses
moves.notesCN: 打防或者挥空+2f收招

moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a Punish Counter Forces the opponent into a standing position
moves.notesCN: 打出确反康强制对手进入浮空硬直，强制对手站立。

moves.notesEN: Knockdown time extended when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, and changes to Hard Knockdown
moves.notesCN: 打出确反康强制倒地，增加倒地时间

moves.nameEN: Jumping Light Punch (During a jump) L
Jumping Light Kick (During a jump) L
Jumping Medium Punch (During a jump) M
moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 击中空中对手时强制对手进入浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: Has cross-up attack properties
moves.notesCN: 有逆向判定

moves.nameEN: Jumping Heavy Punch (During a jump) H
moves.notesEN: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 击中空中对手时将其砸倒

moves.nameEN: Jumping Heavy Kick (During a jump) H
Neutral Jumping Heavy Punch (During a neutral jump) H
moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 打中空中的对手时强制对手进入浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: *Second attack becomes an overhead only if the first attack whiffs
moves.notesCN: 当且仅当第一段攻击挥空时，第二段攻击的判定为中段

moves.notesEN: Blowback knockdown when the first attack hits a mid-air opponent Forces the opponent into a standing position
moves.notesCN: 当第一段攻击打中空中对手时击退对手。强制对手站立

moves.notesEN: * Can transition to Coward Crouch between frames 33 - 34 Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground - Forces a floor bound if the attack hits a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 第33-34帧可以接胆怯附身，打到确反康时攻击性质变化：1，如果对手在地面，打出崩防硬直；2如果对手在空中，打出弹地效果。

moves.notesEN: Forces a Hard Knockdown on Punish Counter
moves.notesCN: 确反康强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Hold down on the stick during the move to continue the technique for 48 more frames During the crouch, press up on the stick to cancel the technique Can transition to Surprise Forward Hop or Surprise Backward Hop from frames 18 - 111 (longest time)
moves.notesCN: 按住方向键增加48帧动作持续时间，8可以取消动作。最长持续时间下，第8-111帧可以取消惊乍前/后跳

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 9 - 43 Can be canceled from mid-air normal attacks or special moves from frames 15 - 43
moves.notesCN: 9-43帧浮空，第15-43帧时可以被任意空中攻击取消

moves.notesEN: Can be canceled into any special-canceable normal or unique attack
moves.notesCN: 可以被任何能被取消的拳脚取消

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 11 - 21 Can be canceled into any special-canceable normal or unique attack
moves.notesCN: 11-21帧浮空，可以被任何能被取消的拳脚取消

moves.notesCN: 按住连续攻击

Considered airborne from frames 10 - 23 Consumes 100 of the Super Art 2 timer Can transition to Rolling Cannon on hit or block

moves.notesCN: 第9-26帧时为浮空状态

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 14 - 36
moves.notesCN: 第14-36帧时为浮空状态

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 18 - 36

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 9 - 36

moves.notesEN: Disappears 1000 frames after landing on the ground Works as a projectile attack when activated by any special moves that produces electricity or comes in contact with a Super Art until the 1000th frame The trajectory of the thrown doll changes if it touches the edge of the screen
moves.notesCN: 释放1000帧后消失，被带电必杀技或者超级必杀技激活时判定为波动判定，板边小布兰卡轨迹会发生变化

moves.notesEN: Start up value is upon being activated
moves.notesCN: 发动帧取决于激活时间

moves.notesEN: Start up value is upon being activated
moves.notesCN: 发动帧取决于激活时间

moves.nameEN: Rolling Cannon (During Lightning Beast)(When performing a rolling-type special move, press any direction)
moves.notesEN: Can transition into any Rolling-style attack a maximum of 3 times
moves.notesCN: 最大可以接三次回旋攻击

moves.notesEN: Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 9 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
moves.notesCN: 1-9帧打投无敌，最低修正30%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变

moves.notesEN: Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 9 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
moves.notesCN: 1-9帧打投无敌，最低修正30%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变

moves.notesEN: Super Art 2 timer is set to 1500 Changes the properties of special moves except for Wild Hunt while active Allows any Rolling-type attack to cancel into Rolling Cannon while active Allows the following attacks to be cancel into without any directional charge - Rolling Attack - Vertical Rolling Attack - Aerial Rolling Attack
moves.notesCN: SA2槽总共1500，改变野兽捕猎摔的性质。允许任何回旋攻击取消回旋炮弹，SA2作用时任何回旋攻击不用蓄力

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12 Considered airborne from frames 2 - 12 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 1-12帧无敌，2-12帧浮空，最低修正50%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变。只能取消必杀技

moves.nameEN: CA Ground Shave Cannonball (when under 25% vitality)
moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12 Considered airborne from frames 2 - 12 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 1-12帧无敌，2-12帧浮空，最低修正50%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变。只能取消必杀技

moves.nameEN: Wild Fang (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.nameEN: Jungle Flip (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.nameEN: Wild Bites (During a jump) (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.
moves.notesCN: 第1-15帧对投无敌

moves.nameEN: Drive Impact: Wild Scratch H H
moves.notesEN: Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27 Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit: - Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground - Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent - Super Art gauge increases by 3000
moves.notesCN: 第1-27帧两次打击霸体，版边会造成对手墙崩。打到确反康性质变化：1，会造成对手进入崩防硬直；2，命中浮空对手时浮空硬直时间增加；3，超级必杀槽增加3000

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while blocking): Quick Rolling Attack (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry) H H
moves.nameCN: 斗反（防守时）：快速回旋撞
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible on frames 1 - 22 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-22帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while recovering): Quick Rolling Attack (During knockdown recovery) H H
moves.nameCN: 斗反（倒地时）：快速回旋撞
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible on frames 1 - 20 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-20帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.notesEN: *1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush *2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period Always in Punish Counter state during execution.
moves.notesCN: 1，从第4帧开始能被绿冲取消；2，蓝防判定会随着按钮的时间延长，但是在蓝防的收招动作中仅有格挡能够取消蓝防的收招，在蓝防动作的持续中，只要被攻击命中就必定为确反康

moves.nameEN: Perfect Parry (strike) Block Direction M M
moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame. (For high and overhead attacks, the player must press the direction away from the opponent. For low attacks, down and back) If no direction is inputted the result will be a regular parry with an additional Drive increase of 3000. Fully invincible for 5 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry) The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，（对上段/中段攻击，需同时输入后，对下段攻击需同时输入下后）。如果没有输入任何方向，则判定为普通蓝防，但额外增加3000点斗气槽回复。完美精防结束后获得5f的无敌帧（如果持续按住蓝防则不获得）。被完美精防的一方在动作结束前不能取消招式，且如果在动作结束前被击中则一定是确反康

moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame No screen freeze occurs. The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，不会出现屏幕冻结特效，被精防波动的一方不能取消动作，且在动作结束前被命中一定会出确反康

moves.nameEN: Parry Drive Rush (During a Drive Parry)
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 10th frame * Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-10帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第9帧开始能够被攻击动作取消，第24帧开始能被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消

moves.nameEN: Cancel Drive Rush (While connecting with a special-cancelable move) ( ) M M
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 9th frame * Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-9帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第10帧开始可以被攻击动作取消，第25帧开始可以被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消
